#summary Definition of t_feed_monitor

= t_feed_monitor =

The t_feed_monitor table defines monitor identifiers.  An OSFE feed monitor can manage the processing of multiple feeds simultaneously.  When a monitor is launched, it must be associated with a defined monitor identifier in t_feed_monitor. Multiple feed monitors can be launched but each in a different JVM.  Each feed monitor must be assigned a unique monitor id defined in t_feed_monitor.
 
|| *Key* || *Name* || *Type* || *Null* || *Description* ||
|| PK || feed_monitor_id || varchar(30) || No || Uniquely defines the feed monitor ||
|| || description || varchar(250) || No || Description of the feed monitor ||
